hints.content:
The first set of blocks shows $\purpleD6$ tens and $\purpleD8$ ones so, our first addend is $\purpleD{68}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/e1d0a1ca76004e60676375ac40128143124c8251)

Our second set of blocks shows $\maroonD2$ tens and $\maroonD8$ ones so, our second addend is $\maroonD{28}$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/80d9770773fa29f1cde7d9322510afd0b1cb8644)

Our sum shows $9$ tens and $6$ ones, or $96$.

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/a4ba035b0736afa5bbeeabbec3999095193782ef)

This equation represents the place value blocks:

$\purpleD{68} + \maroonD{28} =96$

question.content:
**Which equation can be represented from the place value blocks below?**

![](web+graphie:${☣ LOCALPATH}/images/f926c8bfa1143025a639c51d21c84933fd281228)

[[☃ radio 1]]
